name: Planet Coaster - Quick Draw Interactive Shooting Ride
detailed_description:
Quick Draw

Sharpen your aim in this target shooting ride. Ride the track, shoot the targets and log your high score in this test of accuracy. Or create your own themed interactive shooting galleries for a different experience every time.
about_the_game:
Quick Draw

Sharpen your aim in this target shooting ride. Ride the track, shoot the targets and log your high score in this test of accuracy. Or create your own themed interactive shooting galleries for a different experience every time.
short_description: Sharpen your aim in this target shooting ride. Ride the track, shoot the targets and log your high score in this test of accuracy. Or create your own themed interactive shooting galleries for a different experience every time.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+)/8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-2300/AMD FX-4300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 560 (2GB)/AMD Radeon 7850 (2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+)/8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-4770/AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 980 (4GB)/AMD R9 380 (4GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
